TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit RESULTDATAITEM extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Specifies or receives the attributes of result items in the results pane of the snap-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the RESULTDATAITEM structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
